# @heroui/tabs

Tabs organize content into multiple sections and allow users to navigate between them.

Please refer to the [documentation](https://heroui.com/docs/components/tabs) for more information.

## Installation

```sh
yarn add @heroui/tabs
# or
npm i @heroui/tabs
```

## Contribution
